title: printf function
extract: In C programming language, printf() function is used to print the “character, string, float, integer, octal and hexadecimal values” onto the output screen. We use printf() function with %d format specifier to display the value of an integer variable.
extract_html: In C programming language, printf() function is used to print the “character, string, float, integer, octal and hexadecimal values” onto the output screen. We use printf() function with %d format specifier to display the value of an integer variable.
